tweets.text: This time next week we'll be hosting a discussion on Adaptation & Resilience to help better prepare for #climate shocks and #naturaldisasters. We're working with @thecarbontrust with speakers from @EnvAgency and @Hullccnews #adaptation #resilience https://t.co/G8tkNgIoly

Episode 4 of #GeoparkInFocus is out now! Guests joining @Profiainstewart include @beckyartistpoet talking about how @EnglishRiviera inspires her work. Here's a clip @TorbayCulture @EnglishRiviera @The_Shorely @UNESCOUK https://t.co/bRqXL6oOVd

https://t.co/0fHFe149aw

tweets.text:
We will have planted around 300,000 new trees by the end of next April as part of our flagship natural flood management work within @LeedsFAS.

This will help slow the flow of the River Aire & help reduce flood risk & reduce the impact of #climatechange 
 #NationalTreeWeek  #nfm https://t.co/jSzUYoJjMy

Interested in undertaking a PhD in making space for nature in marine engineering then consider this one https://t.co/gz7JDa2saE You will work closely with the @EnvAgency as well as a interdisciplinary team @UofGlasgow @newcastlemarine @IapetusDTP

Please reply with the hashtag #BBCWildlifexEcover & retweet to help us win ¬£150,000 from @Ecoveruk's #FertiliseTheFuture fund! Our @SalmonStour project will improve the River Stour for people & wildlife such as kingfisher & otter! Read more: https://t.co/gSHnuItC1k
#LetsLiveClean https://t.co/93QVzRVRvt

@IronAgeFort @EnvAgency Waisting your time with the EA I repeatedly reported pollution incidents on the Gaywood river July/Aug & EA found nothing Collected sample & tested by @N_Rivers_Trust Ammonia 480mg Phosphate 80mg per litre & solids off the scale EA finally accepted there was a problem ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüí©üíÄüêü https://t.co/xU6G2bRKDx

13:00-14:15 Wed 2 Dec: https://t.co/RdWekTo6Zh https://t.co/sxurk3Dnwk
